mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM portfolio where freelancer_id = #{user_id} and is_deleted = false

SELECT portfolio_id, title, thumbnail, introduce, skill_description, created_date, is_temp_saved FROM portfolio where freelancer_id = #{user_id} and is_deleted is false order by portfolio_id desc limit #{row}, 10
SELECT p.*, pr.project_name FROM portfolio p LEFT JOIN project pr ON p.project_id = pr.project_id WHERE p.portfolio_id = #{portfolio_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio (freelancer_id, title, thumbnail, introduce, skill_description, project_id, attachment, external_url, created_date, is_temp_saved) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{introduce}, #{skill_description}, #{project_id}, #{attachment}, #{external_url}, #{created_date}, 0)
mapper.update: update portfolio set is_deleted=true WHERE portfolio_id = #{portfolio_id}
